allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Set up World of Darkness MMO server foundation

Establish project infrastructure and core architecture for a Node.js/TypeScript
MMO server with WebSocket networking, Prisma ORM, and modular design supporting
multiple client types \(text, 2D, 3D, VR\).

Core Features:
- Active Time Battle \(ATB\) combat system with cooldown-based actions
- LLM-powered AI companions using Anthropic Claude API
- Wildlife ecosystem simulation with life needs \(hunger, thirst, aging\)
- Entity Component System architecture
- Real-time networking via Socket.io + REST API

Infrastructure:
- TypeScript 5.7 with strict configuration
- Jest testing framework with ts-jest
- ESLint for code quality
- Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL
- Redis for caching and real-time state
- Pino for structured logging

Project Structure:
- Networking layer \(WebSocket server, client sessions, connection manager\)
- World management \(zones with spatial indexing\)
- Utility modules \(logger, Vector3 math\)
- Prisma schema for accounts, characters, and world state

Documentation:
- Comprehensive architecture documentation \(ARCHITECTURE.md\)
- Development roadmap and game design overview \(README.md\)
- Task tracking \(TODO.md\), session notes \(CHANGELOG.md\), and implementation notes \(NOTES.md\)
- Environment configuration template \(.env.example\)

License: AGPL-3.0 \(ensuring modified server source availability\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
